segments.text: Hey , your Chinese is coming along !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . It ’ s a lot better than mine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I still get stuck on the different tones.It drives me crazy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hang in there . It ’ ll all come together one of these days .
segments.speaker: S1
